Computational Neutrino Physics¶

This project is part of NeuPhysics . The project neutrino physics notes is meant for the theoretical part of neutrino physics. As the research is going on, numerical method shows its importance. Hence we set up this project to take notes on the computational aspects of neutrino physics.

Here is an index: genindex.html .
